original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord according to all that his father Uzziah had done, except he did not enter the temple of the Lord. But the people still followed corrupt practices.
korean_text: 요담이 그의 아버지 웃시야의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나 여호와의 성전에는 들어가지 아니하였고 백성은 여전히 부패하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 정직한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: according to all that his father Uzziah had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 웃시야가 행한 모든 일대로

sentences.original_text: except he did not enter the temple of the Lord
But the people still followed corrupt practices
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 백성은 여전히 부패한 행실을 저질렀다
